description:
This short depicts the stories of the couples from the Hatsukoi universe on Valentine`s day.
The first part shows Yokozawa Takafumi and Kirishima Hiyori, the second Yoshino Chiaki and Hatori Yoshiyuki, the third Kisa Shouta and Yukina Kou, concluded by Onodera Ritsu and Takano Masamune`.

titles.title: 世界一初恋 バレンタイン編
